title: Prize Email
description: You receive an email claiming you won a phone and asking a small fee to claim.
rationale: Advance‑fee fraud is a phishing tactic.

title: Bank Alert
description: Email says your account is locked and asks you to login via provided link.
rationale: Check domain; urgent lockouts are classic phishing.

title: Delivery Notice
description: Unknown courier asks you to pay customs via link.
rationale: Phishers exploit delivery themes and payment.

title: Colleague Share
description: Known colleague shares a doc via official domain
rationale: Legit shares come from proper domain.

title: Password Reset
description: You request a password reset and receive link from official domain

title: Invoice Scam
description: Vendor “updates” bank details via email only.

title: Security Notice
description: Email asks to verify account within 1 hour.

title: QR Login
description: Official app provides QR to sign in
